title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 122.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 122.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part shall apply to all annual and special school district meetings and
school district public library meetings conducted for the purpose of electing
members of a board of education or school district public library trustees, or
adopting school district or school district public library budgets and
referenda. (b) The provisions of
this Part shall not apply to boards of cooperative educational services
(BOCES). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
122.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 29, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 30, eff. 7/29/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
